titles.title: Ingredients Curation: Harmonized and Integrated Supplement Ingredients

publisher: Course project (UIUC CS598 Foundations of Data Curation)

descriptions.description: This dataset harmonizes product and ingredient information from DSLD, Amazon, Knowde, and internal leads. It includes harmonized and integrated Parquet files, UC-specific CSV views, and quality metrics.

rightsList.rights: For research and teaching only. Respect each source's terms of use.
